Wait, but perhaps I'm misunderstanding the term "assistant manager." In some contexts, a manager might have an assistant who also has a captain. Wait, no, because each team has its own set of managers and captains. So, for example, a manager might have an assistant who is also a captain in their own right, but that's not reflected in this table. The table only lists each team's specific manager and captain.
